title: Claude Opus 4.6 Integration
description: Windsurf integrated Claude Opus 4.6, Anthropic's latest model with 1M token context window, agent teams support, and enhanced agentic coding capabilities. Promotional pricing available: 2x credits (without thinking mode) and 3x credits (with thinking mode) for self-serve users.

community_feedback.quote: We tasked Opus 4.6 using agent teams to build a C Compiler
Is anyone else getting really frustrated with Windsurf lately?

title: Claude Opus 4.6 Generally Available
description: GitHub Copilot announced general availability of Claude Opus 4.6, featuring 1 million token context window, agent teams multi-agent collaboration, 128K token maximum output, and improved planning for agentic tasks.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Opus 4.6 feels very different, inference seems slow but the adaptive thinking feature is notable
Claude Opus 4.6 is now available on GitHub Copilot. Let the coding begin!

title: Claude Opus 4.6 Fast Mode Public Preview
description: GitHub Copilot introduced fast mode for Claude Opus 4.6 in public preview, delivering 2.5x faster token speeds with the same frontier intelligence. Promotional pricing available February 7-16, 2026 at 9 premium requests.

title: Cursor 2.4: Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Cursor 2.4 introduced Subagents for multi-agent parallel processing, Skills framework for better context management, and Image Generation capabilities. Multiple patch releases (2.4.28-2.4.30) followed in early February.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor 2.4.28 Patch Causes Remote Windows SSH Issues - users had to roll back to Cursor 2.4.27 due to broken SSH binary
Cursor 2.4 just unlocked major productivity wins for engineering workflows with Subagents

title: Scheduled Devins
description: Devin AI released Scheduled Devins feature, allowing users to create recurring Devin sessions that run automatically on a schedule without manual intervention, enabling automation of repetitive development tasks.

title: GPT-5 Model Support
description: Aider v0.86.0 added comprehensive support for GPT-5 model with expanded multi-model compatibility, allowing developers to work directly in the terminal with the latest OpenAI models.

community_feedback.quote: Aider v0.86.0携GPT-5与多模型支持震撼发布 - 最强大脑升级

title: Shareable Agents and Code Review Inbox
description: Continue v1.5.34 introduced shareable agents with publicly shareable links and extra instructions for just-in-time prompts, along with code review inbox features for better workflow management.
